channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
item.description: OpenAI and NORAD are bringing new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa” with three ChatGPT holiday tools that let families create festive elves, toy coloring pages, and custom Christmas stories. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/norad-holiday-collaboration

item.title: Accenture and OpenAI accelerate enterprise AI success
item.description: Accenture and OpenAI are collaborating to help enterprises bring agentic AI capabilities into the core of their business and unlock new levels of growth. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/accenture-partnership

item.title: OpenAI takes an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI adoption
item.description: OpenAI takes an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI adoption, embedding frontier research and engineering directly into accounting and IT services to boost speed, accuracy, and efficiency while creating a scalable model for industry-wide transformation. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/thrive-holdings

item.title: Expanding data residency access to business customers worldwide
item.description: OpenAI expands data residency for ChatGPT Enterprise, ChatGPT Edu, and the API Platform, enabling eligible customers to store data at rest in-region. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/expanding-data-residency-access-to-business-customers-worldwide

item.title: Our approach to mental health-related litigation
item.description: We’re sharing our approach to mental health-related litigation. O handle sensitive cases with care, transparency, and respect while continuing to strengthen safety and support in ChatGPT. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/mental-health-litigation-approach

item.title: Inside JetBrains—the company reshaping how the world writes code
item.description: JetBrains is integrating GPT-5 across its coding tools, helping millions of developers design, reason, and build software faster. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/jetbrains-2025

item.title: Introducing shopping research in ChatGPT
item.description: Shopping research in ChatGPT helps you explore, compare, and discover products with personalized buyer’s guides that simplify decision-making Link to article: https://openai.com/index/chatgpt-shopping-research
